ctu_text:
Girl students from Class 1 to 5 and all students (both boys and girls) from Class 6 to 10 are eligible for the benefits under the scheme. 
 1. There is no restriction on the annual family income of the students. 

**Note 1:** One-time failure in a class is allowed.
